@title ChaiConnector
@dev This logic allows to use Chai token (https://github.com/dapphub/chai)

@dev Fixed point division
@return Ceiled value of x / y
nodes.name: rdivup

nodes.documentation: @return Chai token contract address
nodes.name: chaiToken

nodes.name: initializeChaiToken

@param amount Amount of DAI to redeem
nodes.name: _convertChaiToDai

attributes.name: _convertChaiToDai

chaiBalance().details: Evaluates bridge balance in Chai tokens

convertDaiToChai().details: Converts all DAI into Chai tokens, keeping minDaiTokenBalance() DAI as a buffer

decimalShift().details: Returns the value of foreign-to-home decimal shift.

dsrBalance().details: Evaluates bridge balance for tokens, holded in DSR

executeSignatures(bytes,bytes).details: Validates provided signatures and relays a given message

params.signatures: bytes blob with signatures to be validated

investedAmountInDai().details: Evaluates exact current invested amount, in DAI

isChaiTokenEnabled().return: true, if chai token is enabled

isDaiNeedsToBeInvested().details: Checks if DAI balance is high enough to be partially converted to Chai Twice limit is used in order to decrease frequency of convertDaiToChai calls, In case of high bridge utilization in DAI => xDAI direction, convertDaiToChai() will be called as soon as DAI balance reaches 2 * limit, limit DAI will be left as a buffer for future operations.
isDaiNeedsToBeInvested().return: true if convertDaiToChai() call is needed to be performed by the oracle

maxAvailablePerTx().details: Retrieves maximum available bridge amount per one transaction taking into account maxPerTx() and dailyLimit() parameters.
maxAvailablePerTx().return: minimum of maxPerTx parameter and remaining daily quota.

minDaiTokenBalance().details: Evaluates edge DAI token balance, which has an impact on the invest amounts

owner().details: Tells the address of the owner

payInterest().details: Pays all available interest, in Dai tokens. Upgradeability owner can call this method without time restrictions, for others, the method can be called only once a specified period.

removeChaiToken().details: Withdraws all invested tokens, pays remaining interest, removes chai token from contract storage

setGasPrice(uint256).details: Public setter for fallback gas price value. Only bridge owner can call this method.

params._gasPrice: new value for the gas price.

setMinDaiTokenBalance(uint256).details: Sets minimum DAI limit, needed for converting DAI into CHAI

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: the address to transfer ownership to.
